segments.text: I'd like to return this radio .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . Do you have your receipt ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry , but you need a receipt for a refund .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Perhaps you would like to talk to customer service .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , that's a start , I guess .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds good . I'll take the escalator .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good luck . I hope someone can help you .
segments.speaker: S2
